msbt.message: Hey, sorry about earlier. I was way too sick to entertain company. But I'm all good now! stopped by with some medicine that fixed me right up. That's right, old is back on the scene!
Sorry you had to see me like that earlier. I wasn't camera-ready or -ready. I'm all good now, though! Shout-out to for bringing me some medicine.
Hey, sorry about the other day. You know, when you came to see me and I was sneezing my head off? I'm all better now, thanks to the medicine that brought me. See? Check it out!
Yo! Sorry that I could barely get out of bed the other day when you came to visit. What a disaster. Anyway, stopped by later with some medicine, so I'm all good now.
You probably can't tell now, but I was at death's door earlier. Oh, it was bad. Really bad. Then, out of nowhere, my savior appeared. It was , with medicine in hand. My hero!
Ugh, I was so sick earlier It's a good thing you didn't come by.And it's a good thing that DID come by with medicine for me!
You probably can't tell now, but I was at death's door a while back. Oh, it was bad. Really bad. Then, out of nowhere, my savior appeared. It was , with medicine in hand. My hero!

Yo, did you hear about how sick I was the other day? I thought it would be a big news story Anyway, I might not have made it if it weren't for bringing me some medicine. We should both probably send a thank-you card in appreciation of the fact that I'm sitting here today!
Thanks again for that medicine, . I really owe you one. My life was flashing before my eyes, and it could REALLY use some editing and a better soundtrack.

What was that medicine you gave me earlier, anyway? It was so effective and it worked so quickly Waitwas it just a placebo? Was the real medicine just your love?No? Real medicine, huh? Well, who would have thunk it?
Man, that was close I don't think I've ever been that sick before.I also don't know if I've ever had such a considerate friend before. You're the best, !
